info.author: Krzysztof "kkszysiu" Klinikowski
info.description:
Charlock Holmes

Character encoding detecting library for Python using [ICU](http://site.icu-project.org/) and libmagic. Inspired by [Charlock Holmes](https://raw.github.com/brianmario/charlock_holmes)

Dependency
1. icu
2. file(libmagic)

Gentoo
emerge -av dev-libs/icu
emerge -av sys-apps/file

Ubuntu
apt-get install libmagic-dev
apt-get install libicu-dev

Install

python setup build
python setup install

Usage

from charlockholmes import detect
file = open('test.txt')
content = file.read()
print detect(content)
info.name: pycharlockholmes
info.summary: Character encoding detecting library for Python using ICU and libmagic. Based on Ruby implementation https://github.com/brianmario/charlock_holmes and work of https://github.com/xtao/PyCharlockHolmes
info.html_description:
Charlock Holmes

Character encoding detecting library for Python using [ICU](http://site.icu-project.org/) and libmagic. Inspired by [Charlock Holmes](https://raw.github.com/brianmario/charlock_holmes)

Dependency 1. icu 2. file(libmagic)

Gentoo emerge -av dev-libs/icu emerge -av sys-apps/file

Ubuntu apt-get install libmagic-dev apt-get install libicu-dev

Install

python setup build python setup install

Usage

from charlockholmes import detect file = open(‘test.txt’) content = file.read() print detect(content)
